org.requs.facet.syntax.ontology

Interface Ontology

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<org.xembly.Directive>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XeOntology

    public interface Ontology
extends Iterable<org.xembly.Directive>
    Ontology.

    The ontology is write-only. This is how you're supposed to use it: 

     Ontology onto = // make it
 Type type = onto.type("Employee");
 type.mention("3-5");
 type.explain("a person working in a Company");
    Since:
    1.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
